snippet: Main Street Advocacy is set to start an ad campaign on Wednesday that blames conservative groups like the Tea Party for the recent series of political losses in critical elections.
abstract: Open warfare is breaking out among rival Republican groups, with one, Main Street Advocacy, set to start an ad campaign that blames conservative groups like the Tea Party for series of political losses in critical elections across United States.
lead_paragraph: Main Street Advocacy is set to start an ad campaign on Wednesday that blames conservative groups like the Tea Party for the recent series of political losses in critical elections.

headline.main: In G.O.P., a Campaign Takes Aim at Tea Party
headline.print_headline: In G.O.P., A Campaign Takes Aim At Tea Party
